lines.text: You will get everything you want in your lifetime, only you won't get it in the way you expect.
You're damn tooting, nothing lasts forever!
We shall show you that New York City is a dream created by higher beings as a temporary lodging place in the earthly sojourn.
Wow. But how do I know that this isn't a dream right now?
Faith!
How the hell did I wind up singing on a bus to the moon?
Musta been all them women, Mr. Fisher.
And here is your gun.
What? I've never used a gun before in my life. I mean, they scare me.
Come on, Beckett, don't be such a pussy. You don't know who's out there.
It's a player pianey! He's a fake! Get him!
Are they all on, Freida?
Yes, all aboard. They're so helpless!
I know. You go on ahead. I'm gonna say my prayer.
I can see the man in the moon, he's smiling at me.
Welcome to the Moon! Your Moon-O-Rama Consumer Adventure is about to begin.
It's that kid! I knew he was gonna be a problem. Let's go get him! Let's go... get him!
Over the years, Adam, many spirits have helped us bring more light and more understanding into the world. Up there is our gallery of past masters. One day, your picture could be up there.
Amazing.
Occasionally they even visit. You should have been here last week. Walt Whitman was here! What a great man.
Snip snap snorum, hey coco lorum.
